title: Heerak Jhumkas: Polki Diamond & Ruby Statement Earrings
materials: Ruby Cabochons. Features a Hyderabadi polish for lasting luster.
features: A modern take on the traditional Jhumka. This piece features a geometric design with a central Ruby cabochon framed by Polki diamonds. The square motif offers a contemporary flair, while the Polki detailing ensures that the traditional values shine through. The unique setting allows for maximum light reflection from the diamonds, enhancing their brilliance.
colors: and Sparkling White Diamonds. A classic and elegant combination.
occasions: and special occasions. Suitable for both traditional attire such as sarees and lehengas
description: These Heerak Jhumkas represent the perfect blend of traditional craftsmanship and modern design. The use of uncut Polki diamonds offers a unique vintage charm, while the geometric design provides a contemporary edge. Lightweight and comfortable, these earrings will add a touch of elegance and sophistication to any outfit.
